column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Opal says : " Thanks for making my favorite meal . "
#Text=Chef says : " I 'm really going to miss you , Opal .
#Text=" Opal says : " You 're so sweet .
#Text=" Bolin says : " This stinks !
#Text=We were just starting to get to know each other , and now you 're off to the Northern Air Temple .
#Text=" Opal says : " We 'll be together soon .
#Text=You guys are coming up after finding more airbenders , right ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " Yeah , but that 's ... in the future .
#Text=Ugh , I hate the future !
#Text=" Opal says : " Until then , we 'll always have kale .
#Text=" Varrick says : " Kid , can I give you some relationship advice ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " Umm , no .
#Text=" Varrick says : " Well , your loss .
#Text=Zhu Li !
#Text=bring the , uh , thing .
#Text=Check out my latest invention : an airbender finder .
#Text=" Korra says : " Wait , that can find airbenders ?
#Text=" Asami says : " Uh ... I think it 's broken .
#Text=" Varrick says : " It 's not broken .
#Text=She needs to airbend into it !
#Text=How else do you expect the thing to work ?
#Text=" Mako says : " What 's going on ?
#Text=I ca n't hear anything .
#Text=I hate sitting down here !
#Text=Uh , not because of you .
#Text=" Aiwei says : " I can tell you 're lying .
#Text=" Suyin says : " Everyone , if I could have your attention please ?
#Text=Tonight , my beautiful little girl leaves for the Northern Air Temple .
#Text=Opal , none of us could be more proud of you .
#Text=You 're an incredible daughter , sister , friend , and soon to be airbending master .
#Text=Here 's to Opal .
#Text=May she help lead us into the new era !
#Text="
